source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_00<tab>Search for Meteion while accompanied by Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_00<tab>Search for Meteion while accompanied by Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_01<tab>Continue searching for Meteion while accompanied by Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_01<tab>Continue searching for Meteion while accompanied by Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_02<tab>Survey the area while accompanied by Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_02<tab>Survey the area while accompanied by Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_03<tab>Survey the next area while accompanied by Emet-Selch.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_TODO_03<tab>Survey the next area while accompanied by Emet-Selch.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>A frantic search will avail us little. We must be clever about this...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_000<tab>A frantic search will avail us little. We must be clever about this...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_005<tab>In the Final Days, aether is twisted by the invasion of dynamis from beyond the star, its progress intensified by feelings of fear and despair and anguish...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_005<tab>In the Final Days, aether is twisted by the invasion of dynamis from beyond the star, its progress intensified by feelings of fear and despair and anguish...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_006<tab>Nay, I like not the picture which emerges with these latest pieces.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_006<tab>Nay, I like not the picture which emerges with these latest pieces.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HERMES_000_010<tab>My apologies, I... We should focus on the task at hand.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HERMES_000_010<tab>My apologies, I... We should focus on the task at hand.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_020<tab>Correct me if I'm wrong, but Meteion renders herself invisible by matching her aetheric density to that of her surroundings, does she not?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_020<tab>Correct me if I'm wrong, but Meteion renders herself invisible by matching her aetheric density to that of her surroundings, does she not?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_021<tab>If so, could we not then disrupt her concealment with a surfeit of aether? Much how Emet-Selch solidified your presence when first we met you!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_021<tab>If so, could we not then disrupt her concealment with a surfeit of aether? Much how Emet-Selch solidified your presence when first we met you!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_022<tab>Don't be absurd. I can hardly channel aether to a recipient whose whereabouts are hidden from me.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_022<tab>Don't be absurd. I can hardly channel aether to a recipient whose whereabouts are hidden from me.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_023<tab>Which is why we must all work together.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_023<tab>Which is why we must all work together.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will continue the search in the same manner as before, but this time with you in tow. Once <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> ascertains Meteion's likely location, you proceed to reveal our wayward familiar with a swift aetherial downpour!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will continue the search in the same manner as before, but this time with you in tow. Once <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> ascertains Meteion's likely location, you proceed to reveal our wayward familiar with a swift aetherial downpour!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_025<tab>Very clever. And thankfully, she has made herself easier to capture by fleeing towards Lethe.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_025<tab>Very clever. And thankfully, she has made herself easier to capture by fleeing towards Lethe.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_026<tab>Assuming she is made visible, it should prove no great feat to herd her into a corner.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_026<tab>Assuming she is made visible, it should prove no great feat to herd her into a corner.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_027<tab>Then we have our plan. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Emet-Selch will be our tracker and trapper respectively, while we others predict and obstruct Meteion's avenues of escape.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_027<tab>Then we have our plan. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Emet-Selch will be our tracker and trapper respectively, while we others predict and obstruct Meteion's avenues of escape.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_028<tab>Emet-Selch and I will keep an eye on each other's aether to help coordinate our efforts. Let us be about it!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_HYTHLODAEUS_000_028<tab>Emet-Selch and I will keep an eye on each other's aether to help coordinate our efforts. Let us be about it!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_029<tab>...Well, it seems we are partners for the time being. Let us return to where we last saw Meteion and pick up the trail from there.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_029<tab>...Well, it seems we are partners for the time being. Let us return to where we last saw Meteion and pick up the trail from there.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_030<tab>I will keep myself in a state of preparedness, ready to rain down aether at a moment's notice─meaning it falls to <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to keep the way clear.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_030<tab>I will keep myself in a state of preparedness, ready to rain down aether at a moment's notice─meaning it falls to <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to keep the way clear.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Emet-Selch is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Emet-Selch is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>You can leave Emet-Selch behind by entering a different area, putting too much distance between you, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>You can leave Emet-Selch behind by entering a different area, putting too much distance between you, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>If you wish to have Emet-Selch accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>If you wish to have Emet-Selch accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_045<tab>Now, did Meteion go straight ahead towards the pier...or did she stray from the path somewhere?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_045<tab>Now, did Meteion go straight ahead towards the pier...or did she stray from the path somewhere?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_046<tab>As the only one who can hear her voice, you will need to take the lead.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_046<tab>As the only one who can hear her voice, you will need to take the lead.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_Q2_000_050<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Emet-Selch?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_Q2_000_050<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Emet-Selch?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_051<tab>Aren't <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> the one who went to all the trouble of traveling into the past to avert an impending apocalypse? But fine, fine, be my guest! I will await you at the entrance to Lethe.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_051<tab>Aren't <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> the one who went to all the trouble of traveling into the past to avert an impending apocalypse? But fine, fine, be my guest! I will await you at the entrance to Lethe.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_055<tab>The would-be savior of Etheirys past and future returns. After <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my good hero.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_055<tab>The would-be savior of Etheirys past and future returns. After <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, my good hero.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Emet-Selch has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Emet-Selch has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You should have Emet-Selch accompanying you before you attempt to reveal Meteion.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You should have Emet-Selch accompanying you before you attempt to reveal Meteion.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>You calm your mind, your senses questing for any hint of Meteion's presence...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>You calm your mind, your senses questing for any hint of Meteion's presence...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>...But you fail to hear her voice. She must be elsewhere.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_076<tab>...But you fail to hear her voice. She must be elsewhere.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_077<tab>Nothing this way? We try another route, then.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_077<tab>Nothing this way? We try another route, then.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_080<tab>(-Meteion-)Why can't I fly? Are my functions being restricted!?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_080<tab>(-Meteion-)Why can't I fly? Are my functions being restricted!?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_081<tab>(-Meteion-)Hide─yes, I'll just have to hide, then. Where no one can find me...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_081<tab>(-Meteion-)Hide─yes, I'll just have to hide, then. Where no one can find me...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Meteion's anguished voice heads towards the water's edge...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>Meteion's anguished voice heads towards the water's edge...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_083<tab>She went into the lake!? As if this wasn't tiresome enough...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_083<tab>She went into the lake!? As if this wasn't tiresome enough...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_084<tab>Well, at least that open expanse should make her easier to find. We won't lose her this time!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_084<tab>Well, at least that open expanse should make her easier to find. We won't lose her this time!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_090<tab>Ugh. The indignation, to drag my robe through the water. Hythlodaeus better not breathe a word of this to Azem...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_090<tab>Ugh. The indignation, to drag my robe through the water. Hythlodaeus better not breathe a word of this to Azem...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_091<tab>Still, mild humiliation will be the least of our concerns if we fail to get our hands on Meteion!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_091<tab>Still, mild humiliation will be the least of our concerns if we fail to get our hands on Meteion!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_095<tab>We should be able to reach the bottom of this drop by climbing down the rocks at the water's edge.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_095<tab>We should be able to reach the bottom of this drop by climbing down the rocks at the water's edge.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_096<tab>Do not even <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> of dragging me over the falls. Final Days or no, if I end up drenched from head to toe, I swear I will feed you to a remora.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_096<tab>Do not even <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> of dragging me over the falls. Final Days or no, if I end up drenched from head to toe, I swear I will feed you to a remora.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_101<tab>By that rock, is she? Very well!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_101<tab>By that rock, is she? Very well!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_A3_000_105<tab>We will hear your report, good or bad!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_A3_000_105<tab>We will hear your report, good or bad!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...? What are you saying? Everything is so faint...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_106<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...? What are you saying? Everything is so faint...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_107<tab>I'm sorry... I'm not strong enough. Stay away. I'm begging you...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_107<tab>I'm sorry... I'm not strong enough. Stay away. I'm begging you...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_108<tab>Don't make me say it. It will break him. His poor, fragile heart...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_METEION_000_108<tab>Don't make me say it. It will break him. His poor, fragile heart...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_110<tab>Once the others are in position, the two of us can herd her into their midst!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_110<tab>Once the others are in position, the two of us can herd her into their midst!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_120<tab>Keep after Meteion! Hythlodaeus and I will coordinate our movements!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_120<tab>Keep after Meteion! Hythlodaeus and I will coordinate our movements!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_125<tab>Is this neus not in use? It seems to have been left to the mercy of the elements...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_125<tab>Is this neus not in use? It seems to have been left to the mercy of the elements...

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_126<tab>Either way, it bears no trace of Meteion's essence. We move on!
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_126<tab>Either way, it bears no trace of Meteion's essence. We move on!

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_129<tab>You should have Emet-Selch accompanying you before attempting to herd Meteion towards Hythlodaeus and the others.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_SYSTEM_000_129<tab>You should have Emet-Selch accompanying you before attempting to herd Meteion towards Hythlodaeus and the others.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_155<tab>If all Hermes means to do is listen to Meteion's report, then it is his right to do so.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_155<tab>If all Hermes means to do is listen to Meteion's report, then it is his right to do so.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_156<tab>But once he receives the answers to his question, what then? The fate of the world may very well hinge upon the choice he makes in that moment...and we must be there when he makes it.
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_VENAS_000_156<tab>But once he receives the answers to his question, what then? The fate of the world may very well hinge upon the choice he makes in that moment...and we must be there when he makes it.

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_160<tab>Why, Hermes? Why could you not leave well enough alone!?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_160<tab>Why, Hermes? Why could you not leave well enough alone!?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_161<tab>Will these answers assuage the pain you feel when a creation is returned to aether?
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_161<tab>Will these answers assuage the pain you feel when a creation is returned to aether?

source: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_162<tab>Had you never cast your accursed question to the distant stars, you may have one day learned to be at peace upon this one...
target: TEXT_AKTKME118_04436_EMETSELCH_000_162<tab>Had you never cast your accursed question to the distant stars, you may have one day learned to be at peace upon this one...
